summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4737 for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Yale Avenue North and Eastlake Avenue from Edgar Street to Roanoke Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54822, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
